title: Spatial Learning and Navigation Design Course Based on Multimedia Maps

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course for practitioners to understand navigation system design and spatial learning principles, and to acquire map design techniques applicable in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze the functional differences between north-up and track-up map orientations.
Learners can design and evaluate multimedia map interface elements for optimizing spatial learning.
Learners can measure the effectiveness of spatial knowledge acquisition when applying new spatial indicators (advisory indicators) in VR simulation environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
